title: Companies linked to Yolo Run still dogged by unpaid bills and debts
title_page: Companies linked to Yolo Run still dogged by unpaid bills and debts | The Straits Times
maintext:
SINGAPORE - The poorly-organised Yolo Run may have ended more than three months ago, but the dust has still not settled for the players behind it.
Some suppliers allege they have unpaid bills from companies linked to organiser Xavier Bay. One of his firms, X-Change Events, also owes money to two charities that had engaged it to organise events.
